ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Title: Halloween Massacre
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tarot battles a Werewolf, a Vampire, a Mummy, and a Creature from the bogs at a Halloween Party Massacre, as four partygoers are possessed and transformed during a seance! Meanwhile Jon tells Raven of the time he went to a comic-con during Halloween in NYC and met his favorite super-hero in the flesh!
